body:
## What happened

Not sure what happened here. It apparently occured 37 times "since last clear". Everything works correctly afaik.

## Version information

Android Studio `3.1.4` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 28.0.1` • Dart plugin `173.4700`

Flutter 0.8.2 • channel beta • https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git
Framework • revision 5ab9e70727 (2 weeks ago) • 2018-09-07 12:33:05 -0700
Engine • revision 58a1894a1c
Tools • Dart 2.1.0-dev.3.1.flutter-760a9690c2

## Exception

null

```
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at io.flutter.server.vmService.frame.DartVmServiceEvaluator.evaluate(DartVmServiceEvaluator.java:108)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.XValueHint.evaluateAndShowHint(XValueHint.java:186)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.common.AbstractValueHint.invokeHint(AbstractValueHint.java:154)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.common.ValueLookupManager.lambda$null$3(ValueLookupManager.java:190)
	at com.intellij.util.ui.UIUtil.invokeLaterIfNeeded(UIUtil.java:2795)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.common.ValueLookupManager.lambda$doShowHint$4(ValueLookupManager.java:182)
	at org.jetbrains.concurrency.AsyncPromise.setHandler(AsyncPromise.kt:201)
	at org.jetbrains.concurrency.AsyncPromise.done(AsyncPromise.kt:43)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.common.ValueLookupManager.doShowHint(ValueLookupManager.java:176)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.common.ValueLookupManager.lambda$showHint$1(ValueLookupManager.java:155)
	at com.intellij.psi.impl.PsiDocumentManagerBase.performWhenAllCommitted(PsiDocumentManagerBase.java:546)
	at com.intellij.psi.impl.PsiDocumentManagerBase.performWhenAllCommitted(PsiDocumentManagerBase.java:537)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.common.ValueLookupManager.showHint(ValueLookupManager.java:155)
	at com.intellij.xdebugger.impl.evaluate.quick.common.ValueLookupManager.lambda$requestHint$0(ValueLookupManager.java:129)
	at com.intellij.util.concurrency.QueueProcessor.runSafely(QueueProcessor.java:246)
	at com.intellij.util.Alarm$Request.runSafely(Alarm.java:417)
	at com.intellij.util.Alarm$Request.access$700(Alarm.java:344)
	at com.intellij.util.Alarm$Request$1.run(Alarm.java:384)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.TransactionGuardImpl$2.run(TransactionGuardImpl.java:315)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.LaterInvocator$FlushQueue.runNextEvent(LaterInvocator.java:424)
	at com.intellij.openapi.application.impl.LaterInvocator$FlushQueue.run(LaterInvocator.java:407)
	at java.awt.event.InvocationEvent.dispatch(InvocationEvent.java:311)

	at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
	at java.security.ProtectionDomain$JavaSecurityAccessImpl.doIntersectionPrivilege(ProtectionDomain.java:80)
	at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(EventQueue.java:732)
	at com.intellij.ide.IdeEventQueue.defaultDispatchEvent(IdeEventQueue.java:822)
	at com.intellij.ide.IdeEventQueue._dispatchEvent(IdeEventQueue.java:650)
```

comment_data.body: Thanks for the report! I believe this was already addressed by https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/pull/2598, and will be available in the next release.

title: Android Studio NullPointerException
